register.name: SC1A
register.description: ADC Status and Control Registers 1

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00000
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, DADP0 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD0 is selected as input.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00001
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, DADP1 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD1 is selected as input.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00010
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, DADP2 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD2 is selected as input.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00011
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, DADP3 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD3 is selected as input.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00100
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD4 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00101
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD5 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00110
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD6 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b00111
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD7 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01000
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD8 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01001
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD9 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01010
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD10 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01011
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD11 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01100
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD12 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01101
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD13 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01110
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD14 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b01111
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD15 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10000
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD16 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10001
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD17 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10010
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD18 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10011
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD19 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10100
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD20 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10101
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD21 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10110
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD22 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b10111
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD23 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b11010
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, Temp Sensor (single-ended) is selected as input; when DIFF=1, Temp Sensor (differential) is selected as input.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b11011
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, Bandgap (single-ended) is selected as input; when DIFF=1, Bandgap (differential) is selected as input.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b11101
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0,VREFSH is selected as input; when DIFF=1, -VREFSH (differential) is selected as input. Voltage reference selected is determined by SC2[REFSEL].

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b11110
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0,VREFSL is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved. Voltage reference selected is determined by SC2[REFSEL].

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b11111
bit_field_value.description: Module is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_DIFF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Single-ended conversions and input channels are selected.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_DIFF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Differential conversions and input channels are selected.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_AIEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Conversion complete interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_AIEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Conversion complete interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_COCO_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Conversion is not completed.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_COCO_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Conversion is completed.

bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0, AD20 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_ADCH_0b11111
bit_field_value.description: Module is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_DIFF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Single-ended conversions and input channels are selected.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_DIFF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Differential conversions and input channels are selected.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_AIEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Conversion complete interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_AIEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Conversion complete interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_COCO_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Conversion is not completed.

bit_field_value.name: SC1_COCO_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Conversion is completed.

register.name: CFG1
register.description: ADC Configuration Register 1

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADICLK_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Bus clock

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADICLK_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Bus clock divided by 2(BUSCLK/2)

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADICLK_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Alternate clock (ALTCLK)

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADICLK_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Asynchronous clock (ADACK)

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_MODE_0b00
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 8-bit conversion; when DIFF=1, it is differential 9-bit conversion with 2's complement output.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_MODE_0b01
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 12-bit conversion ; when DIFF=1, it is differential 13-bit conversion with 2's complement output.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_MODE_0b10
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 10-bit conversion. ; when DIFF=1, it is differential 11-bit conversion with 2's complement output

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_MODE_0b11
bit_field_value.description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 16-bit conversion..; when DIFF=1, it is differential 16-bit conversion with 2's complement output

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADLSMP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Short sample time.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADLSMP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Long sample time.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADIV_0b00
bit_field_value.description: The divide ratio is 1 and the clock rate is input clock.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADIV_0b01
bit_field_value.description: The divide ratio is 2 and the clock rate is (input clock)/2.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADIV_0b10
bit_field_value.description: The divide ratio is 4 and the clock rate is (input clock)/4.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADIV_0b11
bit_field_value.description: The divide ratio is 8 and the clock rate is (input clock)/8.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADLPC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal power configuration.

bit_field_value.name: CFG1_ADLPC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Low-power configuration. The power is reduced at the expense of maximum clock speed.

register.name: CFG2
register.description: ADC Configuration Register 2

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADLSTS_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Default longest sample time; 20 extra ADCK cycles; 24 ADCK cycles total.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADLSTS_0b01
bit_field_value.description: 12 extra ADCK cycles; 16 ADCK cycles total sample time.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADLSTS_0b10
bit_field_value.description: 6 extra ADCK cycles; 10 ADCK cycles total sample time.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADLSTS_0b11
bit_field_value.description: 2 extra ADCK cycles; 6 ADCK cycles total sample time.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADHSC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal conversion sequence selected.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADHSC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: High-speed conversion sequence selected with 2 additional ADCK cycles to total conversion time.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADACKEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Asynchronous clock output disabled; Asynchronous clock is enabled only if selected by ADICLK and a conversion is active.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_ADACKEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Asynchronous clock and clock output is enabled regardless of the state of the ADC.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_MUXSEL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: ADxxa channels are selected.

bit_field_value.name: CFG2_MUXSEL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: ADxxb channels are selected.

register.name: RA
register.description: ADC Data Result Register

register.name: RB
register.description: ADC Data Result Register

register.name: CV1
register.description: Compare Value Registers

register.name: CV2
register.description: Compare Value Registers

register.name: SC2
register.description: Status and Control Register 2

bit_field_value.name: SC2_REFSEL_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Default voltage reference pin pair, that is, external pins VREFH and VREFL

bit_field_value.name: SC2_REFSEL_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Alternate reference pair, that is, VALTH and VALTL . This pair may be additional external pins or internal sources depending on the MCU configuration. See the chip configuration information for details specific to this MCU

bit_field_value.name: SC2_DMAEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: DMA is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_DMAEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: DMA is enabled and will assert the ADC DMA request during an ADC conversion complete event noted when any of the SC1n[COCO] flags is asserted.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ACREN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Range function disabled. Only CV1 is compared.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ACREN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Range function enabled. Both CV1 and CV2 are compared.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ACFGT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Configures less than threshold, outside range not inclusive and inside range not inclusive; functionality based on the values placed in CV1 and CV2.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ACFGT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Configures greater than or equal to threshold, outside and inside ranges inclusive; functionality based on the values placed in CV1 and CV2.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ACFE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Compare function disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ACFE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Compare function enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ADTRG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Software trigger selected.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ADTRG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Hardware trigger selected.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ADACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Conversion not in progress.

bit_field_value.name: SC2_ADACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Conversion in progress.

register.name: SC3
register.description: Status and Control Register 3

bit_field_value.name: SC3_AVGS_0b00
bit_field_value.description: 4 samples averaged.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_AVGS_0b01
bit_field_value.description: 8 samples averaged.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_AVGS_0b10
bit_field_value.description: 16 samples averaged.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_AVGS_0b11
bit_field_value.description: 32 samples averaged.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_AVGE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Hardware average function disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_AVGE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Hardware average function enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_ADCO_0b0
bit_field_value.description: One conversion or one set of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled, that is, AVGE=1, after initiating a conversion.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_ADCO_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Continuous conversions or sets of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled, that is, AVGE=1, after initiating a conversion.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_CALF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Calibration completed normally.

bit_field_value.name: SC3_CALF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Calibration failed. ADC accuracy specifications are not guaranteed.

register.name: OFS
register.description: ADC Offset Correction Register

register.name: PG
register.description: ADC Plus-Side Gain Register

register.name: MG
register.description: ADC Minus-Side Gain Register

register.name: CLPD
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLPS
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP3
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP2

register.name: CLP1
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP0
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLMD
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLMS
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM4
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM3
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM2
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM1
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM0
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register
